typeDescription.name: com.xerox.xrce.uima.sharedtypes.TextBlockAnnotated
typeDescription.description: The existence of a structure of this type means that some component has processed the document looking for TextBlocks. If TextBlockAnnotated is present but no TextBlocks are, it means that the document contains no text blocks to be analyzed. If TextBlockAnnotated is absent, it means that the entire document is to be considered a single text block.

typeDescription.name: com.xerox.xrce.uima.sharedtypes.TextBlock
typeDescription.description: A span of text whose beginning and end are sentence boundaries. In other words, no sentence should span multiple TextBlocks.
